title: Where ya from? (Studio Ghibli)
description: A typing game kind of like Tetris and based off of the beloved works of Studio Ghibli! See how many names you can type and learn more about the stories they are in. The names you type, the faster and harder it will get.
author: Taylor N. Delnotch

title: Newspaper Comic Trivia
description: Charile Brown, Garfield, Beetle Bailey, Dennis the Menis, Zits, etc. How much do you know about the iconic artifacts? Test your nostalgia with fun facts about these characters, their worlds, and the creators behind them!
author: Vallery

title: The Legendary Pipe Cleaner
description: There has been an increased number of Piranha plants sprouting in the pipe system. Play as Mario as you traverse complex mazes and clear out the voracious vegetation. Discover powerups, unclock passage ways, and make the pipes of Mushroom Kingdom a safer place. Watch out for Petey though!
author: StephenOrSteve

title: Cut that Grass!
description: Based off of the Legend of Zelda series, play as 8-bit link and swing your sword throughout Hyrule field... cutting the grass. Clear the screen as fast as you can while patches grow back spontaneously. Collect treasure along the way, but look out for monsters lurking in the greenery as well.
author: Nathan

title: Just Keep Running
description: Based off of the Sonic the Hedgehog series and that one dinosaur game people play on google when they can't conneect to the internet; see how fast and how far you can get Sonic as he runs through different zones. Hop over obtstacles, duck under flying robots, and collect rings as you run nonstop.
author: Lyle

title: Pokemon Mix Cafe
description: Browse through a diverse array of menu items pulled from the Pokemon Mix Cafe game. Add whatever catches your eye to your cart and check out! You won't get anything, but hey, the website is cool!
author: Lloyd

title: Okay! Who did it?!?!
description: A handful of new mysterious reaches the court room of defense atourney Pheonix Wright! Use logic and investigations skills to solve murders, heists, romance dramas, and much more. All fan made cases made to continue the Wright legacy!
author: Taylor N. Delnotch

title: I'm a little space ship nyow!
description: Self made spaceship simulator: Star Wars themed. Zoom around the endless void of space; passing iconic planets, discovering new, fan-made star systems, and dog fighting it with online opponents! Choose to be with the Empire or the Rebels and blast your way to victory in space ships you can custom make with parts you win and discover.
author: 5C0TT13!!!

title: Pokemon! Ro-Sham-Bo
description: This game was made as a final project for a different class and pulls from a free API themed with Pokemon stats. Similar to Rock-Paper-Scizors, you and your opponent choose a Pokemon and the winner is determined by Type dominance as well as size.
author: Shoryu Man123

title: Flip Wart
description: Pulled from a childrens' TV show called Amphibia, its' basically chess with some altered rules, pieces abilities, and of course; frog themed. Play against different characters from the Amphibia TV show and see who comes out on top. If you get really good, you might be able to beat King Andreas
author: Marcy Wu

title: A day in: The Office
description: If you've seen all seasons and all epsiodes of The Office, you'll love this fan made game! Follow Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, Jim Halpert, Pam Beesly, and other characters from TV show as they go about their hilarious day! Watch cut scenes from
author: Vallery

title: Sorting Things Out
description: Hey guys! I made my own Harry Potter themed personality test. I've had many of my friends and family members test it out and compare it to the actual Pottermore website, and it's pretty accurate! You should all check it out!
author: Sabrina

title: Hero Summer Training
description: Pulling from season three of My Hero Academia; join Class 1A and 1B during their time at Summer Training Camp. Train you quirks in one on one sparing matches.
author: Jessienator059995

title: Warewolf
description: I recreated an online version of Wearwolf; the murderous party game where townspeople have to figure out who the wearwolfs are before they get picked off one by one during the nights.
author: ChetCodesInc.
